content.prompt: Based on the information presented in the scenario, which of the following ethical procedures did Mr. Flores violate?

choices.label: Mr. Flores did not use random assignment with the groups.
Mr. Flores should avoid using his own students in research.
Mr. Flores should have kept the studentsâ€™ results anonymous.
Mr. Flores may have caused psychological harm to the students.

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
